medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent linear growth and infertility in a man with congenital aromatase deficiency.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient came to attention at 31 years of age with ongoing linear growth and infertility. At 18 years, he was 170 cm tall, and by 31 years, his height increased to 187 cm. His bone age was determined to be 14.8 years.
medical_history.family_history: Parents were consanguineous; heights noted are mother 162 cm and father 170 cm.
